&reftitle.description;
public boolAMQPConnection::setTimeout floattimeout
Set the amount of time, in seconds, after which this instance of an AMQPConnection object times out a request to the broker. Setting this value will override the default value specified by the amqp.timeout INI setting.
To specify a timeout of 500ms, simply pass in 0.5.

&reftitle.errors;
Throws an AMQPConnectionException if timeout is longer less than 0.
